cause.description:
Since 1966, the Chesapeake Bay Foundation has been the voice of those who care about restoring North America's largest estuary. Our motto "Save the Bay" has defined that mission to the 16 million people who live in the 6 state Chesapeake Bay Watershed. CBF is the largest and only independent, Bay-wide organization that exists solely to restore and protect the vitality of the Bay.
_____________________________
If you have any news or events that relate to the Bay, send me a message and I'll post it here! _____________________________
Thanks for all of your support!
1. The Chesapeake Bay is a habitat and resource that must be conserved.
2. Education and activism are key to the continued survival and ecological prosperity of the Bay.
3. We must take on the responsibility of reducing pollution and other harmful human impacts.
cause.mission: To raise awareness, support, and money for the health of the Chesapeake Bay.
cause.name: Save the Chesapeake
